name: Sorting test
description: Sorting is not available for InfoWidget.

steps.name: Authorization via KeyCloak with login: demo and password

testStage.description: Sorting is not available for InfoWidget.

steps.name: Selecting the DateTime filtration section in the left menu.

Validation InfoWidget by heading (Title) Info title
Validation of a field with the DateTime by heading customField
Sorting
